name: Horny Bunnies
description:
Oh no ! Your bunnies escaped from their cages !

You need to catch them before they dirty your garden with poop and do naughty things...

You'll only need the left mouse button to do so ! Grab a rabbit then drag and drop it in the right cage. Do it as fast as you can before their number become... Unstable... 

The team : 

Grommel : Programmer/Game-design/Sound-design

Axoupi : Game Artist
